response.overview: El, a young anthropomorphic hyena woman, navigates the shadowy, litter-strewn back alleys of a sprawling futuristic city, where anthropomorphic animals and sentient robots of endless variety call home. El is in search of something lost to her and she is determined to find it. In hopes of answers, she heads into the inner city for something that could help...
response.tagline: To find something lost, hope is needed.
response.title: Persistence
